front.title: Tomato
front.subtitle: red thing
front.body: is this item a fruit or vegitable? Many people around the world have argued this fact for ages. Some even lobbied for this to be counted as a vegitable so pizza can stay in the menus at schools.

back.body: It is a vegitable! Joke! Its a fruit
